text: Andrew Philip Mehrtens was born 28 April, 1973 in Durban, South Africa. He was a New Zealand rugby player who played 70 tests/72 games for New Zealand and Canterbury in rugby. He is the grandson of George Mehrtens and the brother in law of Reuben Thorne. ==Other websites== * Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:New Zealand rugby union players
title: Andrew Mehrtens
